text:
@GovMurphy B.S. ! ! The number of deaths due to COVID-19 in the USA 97,000+ is 28 percent of the worlds' total deaths ! !  But we have only 4.2 percent of the worlds' population. 
Somebody is "doctoring" ( excuse the pun ) the data. https://t.co/hDdMme9nu4
